instructions.text: step 1 Finely chop the coriander stalk and combine with the oyster and soy_sauce. Lightly season, then tip into a sandwich bag with the steak. Massage the marinade into the meat, then put in the fridge for up to 3 hrs, but at least 1 hr.

step 2 Put the dipping_sauce ingredient in a bowl, finely chop 34 of the coriander leaves and add them too. Taste the sauce if you like it sweeter, add a little more sweet_chilli_sauce; if you prefer it more salty, add a little extra fish_sauce. Set aside.

STEP 3 Heat a frying pan over a high heat and, once very hot, cook the steak for 2- 3 min each side, depending on how well done you like it. Rest the steak for 5- 10 min before slicing and serving on a bed of herb, with the sauce on the side.
Put all the marinade ingredient in a food processor. whizz to a sauce.
Put the chicken in a container and pour over the marinade. cover and chill in the fridge for a couple of hour or overnight to marinate.

Heat the oil in a large frying pan or casserole. Remove the chicken from the marinade and add to the pan, reserving the marinade. brown lightly on each side for 5 minute. Add the mushroom and sauté for 2- 3 minute. Pour over the marinade, then add the green_bean and red_pepper. cover and simmer gently for 10- 15 minute until the chicken is cooked through with no pink meat showing. Add the spinach and stir for a minute to wilt.
Serve the chicken_curry with the rice_noodle in bowl, with coriander_leave scattered over.

title: Thai Spicy Green Papaya Salad Recipe With Sweet Corn - Som Tum Khao Pod

instructions.text: To begin making the thai spicy corn and green_papaya salad recipe, we will first grate carrot and papaya.
I personally like to use a food processors grater attachment to grate the raw green_papaya and the carrot., The processor simplifies the process of making the salad.
To prepare the dressing for the salad, in a pestle and mortar, add the garlic, grated ginger, chilli and lightly pound them.
Add the sugar, lemon_juice and soy_sauce, pound with the pestle and pound again.
Add half of the roasted_peanut and lightly pound along with the remaining seasoning ingredient.
The next step is to combine all the ingredient for the salad.
Into a large salad bowl, add grated papaya, carrot, sliced_tomato, the remaining peanut and steamed corn.
Pour dressing over the grated the vegetable and toss them in the dressing.

Check the salt, spice and sugar level and adjust to suit your taste. Serve the thai spicy corn green_papaya salad as an appetizer for the party or as a side dish for the main course along with the thai curry and steamed_rice.

title: Vegetarian Tofu Matzo Ball Soup Recipe

instructions.text: To start making vegetarian tofu matzo ball soup, in a small stir fry pan, heat a teaspoon of oil over medium heat.
Add garlic, ginger and saute for a minute.
Add onion and cook until soft.

Turn off the heat. In a mixing bowl mix the matzo_meal or bread_crumb, sautéed onion_salt and pepper to combine. In a food processor or blender, combine the tofu, vegetable_broth, parsley and remaining oil until it forms a smooth paste.
Add the tofu mixture to the matzo_meal mixture and mix to combine.
Cover the bowl and refrigerate the batter overnight or for 5- 6 hour. To make the soup, in a saucepan heat the oil over medium heat.
Add the onion, carrot and cook for few minute or until the vegetable are tender.
Add the hot vegetable_broth, chopped_parsley and dil.
season with salt and pepper to taste.
Bring to a boil, reduce the heat and simmer for till the vegetable are tender. While soup is simmering, divide the matzo ball mixture into small equal portion and shape into small size ball.
Add the tofu matzo balls to the soup, simmer for 15 to 20 minute or until they float to the surface and are cooked through.
Turn off the heat.
Serve vegetarian tofu matzo ball soup along with herb mushroom bruschetta.

title: Tandoori Style Soya Chaap Curry Recipe

instructions.text: To begin making the tandoori style soya_chaap curry recipe, first remove the stick from soya_chaap and dice them small circular piece. Next, take a bowl and add diced soya_chaap, ginger_garlic_paste, and salt together.
Use your hand to rub the mixture on soya_chaap.
Let it marinate for 15 minute. Meanwhile, take the red_pepper and keep it directly on gas fire for roasting.
Roast till it gets charred from all the side.
Let it cool down for few minute.
Use your hand to remove the burnt skin from the pepper.
Grind the roasted pepper green chillies together. Now take the marinated soya_chaap and add red_pepper paste, whisked yogurt, grated cheese and all the spice into it.
Give it a good stir so that soya_chunk are properly coated.
Cover the bowl with a cling film leave it for another 15 minute of marination.
Once marinated, then heat up oil in pan and first add the soya_chunk in order to fry them.
Cook them for 7- 8 minute and then add the left over marinade into the pan.
cook on low heat till the gravy starts thickening. Adjust salt as per your taste and turn off the heat.
Garnish it with some fresh coriander_leave and serve hot. Serve tandoori style soya_chaap curry along with tomato onion cucumber raita and whole_wheat lachha paratha for a weekday meal.
To begin making the vegetarian potato hash, first get all the ingredient chopped and ready and keep them by the side. heat 2 tablespoon of oil in a non stick skillet on low heat.
Add the onion, the vegetable, sprinkle some salt and cook, stirring occasionally, until golden.
You can optionally sprinkle some water, cover the pan and cook until the potato are cooked through. Once cooked, transfer the cooked_vegetable to a plate.
In the same pan add another tablespoon of oil, add the diced_potato and cook.
Stir occasionally and cook for about 13 minute or until they form a golden crust.
Meanwhile in a small bowl, mix the ketchup, soy_sauce, water, Italian seasoning, minced thyme and stir well.
Add the cooked mixed_vegetable to the skillet along with potato.
stir in the ketchup mixture and cook, stirring frequently.
Cook for about 5 to 7 minute or until the flavor blend in and the hash has browned nicely.
Once done the vegetarian potato hash is ready to be served. Serve the vegetarian potato hash warm with egg_white omelette with spinach and muskmelon kharbuj juice for breakfast.

To begin making handi biryani recipe With chicken, first marinate the chopped chicken_piece in a large bowl with curd, salt, half of the pepper_powder, half of ginger- garlic_paste and red_chilli_powder for 30 minute. Also soak rice for 20 minute and drain all the water once done with soaking them, and keep aside. Meanwhile, you can cook the egg till hardboiled.
Once the egg is boiled, peel the shell. Heat a shallow frying pan with a little oil or ghee.
Once hot, slice each egg to four piece, and fry them on all side till browned.

Reserve these boiled and fried_egg for serving the handi biryani. Once the egg are prepared, the rice is soaked, and the chicken is marinated, proceed with making the biryani. In a handi, heat a tablespoon of ghee and on a medium heat, add the marinated chicken_piece along with the leftover marinade.
cook for 5- 7 minute or till the chicken is softer and at least half- cooked.

Once done, take them out and keep them aside. Add some more ghee into the handi and add ginger_juice, cover the handi for a minute to temper the ghee. Add bay_leave, and rest of the whole masala like clove, cardamom, cinnamon, mace, nutmeg, black_pepper, and bay_leaves and cook for a minute or till amazingly fragrant. Now add the chopped_onion and cook until it is golden brown.

Now add the rest of the ginger_garlic_paste, corsely pounded red_chilli, remaining black_pepper_powder and turmeric_powder and cook for about 2 minute or till the raw smell goes away. Now add the half done chicken_piece and cook for a few more minute.
Be prepared with the hot_water to add to the recipe by this time as well.
amount of hot_water also depends on the rice that you are using.
We want this to be on the fluffier side and hence, adjust the water accordingly. Check the salt and adjust if required.

Bring the biryani to a boil and close the lid, stirring occasionally. Once the mixture has come to a rolling boil, add the drained rice and cook for 15- 20 minute or till the rice is cooked well. While serving, add the boiled and fried_egg that were kept reserved, such that each serving gets at least 2 piece of the egg too. Serve handi biryani recipe With chicken along with a side dish like tomato onion cucumber raita recipe, and a side of chicken seekh kebab recipe.

title: Spiced Cauliflower And Almond Soup Recipe

instructions.text: To begin making the spiced cauliflower And almond soup recipe, rinse and wash cauliflower.
chop roughly.
I have used blanched_almond here, you can use plain almond too.heat olive_oil in a large sauce pan.
Add cauliflower_floret and roast until the floret start to brown.
Now add harissa_paste, all the spice_powder and salt to taste, mix.
Cook for a minute.
Add blanched_almond and cook for another minute.
Add vegetable_stock or even chicken_stock if you are non vegetarian, cover the pan with lid and bring it to boil.
When the cauliflower_floret gets cooked fully, using a hand blender blend until smooth.
Add pepper_powder, mix.
Check for seasoning and adjust accordingly.
Pour the soup into serving bowl and serve hot. Serve spiced cauliflower And almond soup with herbed garlic_bread for a weeknight dinner.

title: Shakshuka With Spinach & Feta Cheese Recipe

instructions.text: To begin making the shakshuka With spinach feta_cheese recipe we first have to get all the set of ingredient ready.
Have the tomato puree ready and some tomato, blanched and chopped roughly. Preheat the oven to 180 C.Heat oil in a cast iron pan.
Add the onion, garlic, chopped red_bell_pepper and sauté over medium heat until soft and tender.

Add in the jalapenos and spinach and cook for another couple of minute until the spinach wilts down. Finally stir in the tomato puree, along with the chopped_tomato, bay_leaf, salt, sugar, red_chilli, paprika, cumin_powder and cook them all together for another 5 to 10 minute until the spicy tomato_sauce has slightly thickened. At this stage, stir in the feta_cheese, check the salt and spice and adjust to suit your taste.
Remember feta already has a lot of salt in it. Finally, crack the egg into the tomato mixture and space them out evenly.
Place the shakshuka into the oven and bake until the egg are just about set and cooked from the top.
This would take about 5 to 7 minute.

Once done, remove from the oven, sprinkle the chopped coriander leaves on the top and serve it along with a hot_sauce. Serve the shakshuka With spinach And feta_cheese along with whole_grain like couscous or a steamed millet, and a side of Rustic rosemary garlic zucchini bread to make it a complete meal by itself.

title: Pasta In Pudina Chutney Sauce - A Indian Fusion Recipe

instructions.text: To begin making pasta In pudina chutney, lets start by cooking pasta. In a large pot, add water and bring it to a boil., Once the water has boiled, add a teaspoon of salt. Add the shell_pasta to the boiling_water and cook in the boiling_water until it is al_dente just cooked.
This process should take a good 12- 15 minute.
Once the shell_pasta has cooked, drain the water and run the cooked pasta under running water to stop the cooking process.
Drizzle some oil on top of pasta and make sure to coat all of the pasta with the oil In a mixer, add mint_leave_coriander leave, chilie, lemon_juice, salt and grind into a smooth paste.
In a non- stick pan, add olive_oil, minced_garlic and saute them for 2- 3 minute until the garlic has browned.
Now add the freshly ground pudina chutney and saute for 5- 6 minute until the raw smell goes off.
Add the cooked pasta to the pudina chutney and mix until all the pasta is coated well with the chutney.
Add salt and pepper according to your taste.
If you think the pasta is too dry, add 2 teaspoon of water to give it a creamy texture.

You can also cream to give the pasta In pudina chutney a creamy texture. Garnish the pasta in pudina chutney along spring_onion or parsley and serve. Serve the pasta In pudina chutney with a slice of garlic_bread and a summer lettuce salad recipe for a quick weeknight dinner.
